title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
creator_credit: Pathé Entertainment, Argos Films, Como Films, Daiei Film, Pathé Overseas, Marguerite Duras, Mayo, Samy Halfon, Gerard Collery, Minoru Esaka, Lucilla Mussini, Petri, Alain Resnais and Anatole Dauman
brief_description: The deep conversation between a Japanese architect and a French actress forms the basis of this celebrated French film, considered one of the vanguard productions of the French New Wave. Set in Hiroshima after the end of World War II, the couple — lovers turned friends — recount, over many hours, previous romances and life experiences. The two intertwine their stories about the past with pondering the devastation wrought by the atomic bomb dropped on the city.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.
